news: Apple has officially announced the iPhone 15 lineup during its September launch event. The new models feature a USB-C port for the first time, replacing the traditional Lightning connector. The Pro models include a titanium frame, a new A17 Pro chip, and improved camera capabilities including a 5x telephoto lens on the iPhone 15 Pro Max. The devices will be available starting next week
label: Fake
